definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: Commercial press-release distribution services are also used to distribute news releases.
sentences.chinese: 商业新闻发布分销服务也被用来散布新闻稿。

sentences.english: The text of the press release that is going out this morning follows this note.
sentences.chinese: 该新闻稿是今天上午发出去的连同说明，全文如下。

sentences.english: Supporters of Mr. Roh issued news releases denouncing Mr. Lee and prosecutors.
sentences.chinese: 卢武铉的支持者发表新闻稿指责李明博和检察部门。

sentences.english: Press Releases are often formal marketing communications, not exactly conversational.
sentences.chinese: 新闻稿通常是正式的营销传播，不完全是会话式的。

sentences.english: A pdf of the press release is attached at the end of the message.
sentences.chinese: 是次发布会的新闻稿可在此留言的最下位置下载。

sentences.english: Later you can cover a story and submit the article yourself.
sentences.chinese: 以后，你就可以自己采访新闻，提交新闻稿了。

sentences.english: Apple's pre-order press release didn't mention accessories.
sentences.chinese: Apple的预售新闻稿没有提及配件。

sentences.english: S&P rewrote its press release to reflect this change.
sentences.chinese: 标普重新撰写了其新闻稿以反映这一变化。

sentences.english: To send and receive press releases and press hundreds of groups.
sentences.chinese: 瑞安先生发送和接收新闻稿和新闻资料袋数百人。

sentences.english: The telex chattered all day and night with news bulletins.
sentences.chinese: 电传机没日没夜“嗒嗒嗒”地接收新闻稿。

sentences.english: Why not submit a press release informing the public about your new site?
sentences.chinese: 问什么不提交一份新闻稿向公众告知你的新网站呢？
共和党发布“我告诉过你”新闻稿。

sentences.english: The science reporter is unlikely to be handed ready-made science stories.
sentences.chinese: 科学记者很难拿到现成的科学新闻稿。

definition: to carry a story/to publish (in a newspaper or magazine)
bid or tender submission or delivery/bid or tender document
